home.desc: Hello and welcome to my portfolio! I’m a passionate and versatile Front-End Developer with hands-on experience in building modern,responsive, and high-performance web applications using Angular and vanilla JavaScript. I focus on creating clean, scalable code and delivering smooth user experiences across all devices. I have a solid understanding of responsive design principles, UI/UX best practices, and real-world problem-solving in the front-end world. Currently, I’m expanding my skill set by diving into Back-End Development, with the goal of becoming a well-rounded Full-Stack Developer. I'm always excited to learn new technologies, explore performance optimizations, and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in web development. If you're looking for someone who’s detail-oriented, fast-learning, and truly enjoys turning ideas into functional interfaces — you’re in the right place.
